title: Feature Discovery by Deep Learning for Aesthetic Analysis of Evolved Abstract Images
authors: A Campbell, V Ciesielksi, AK Qin - …  Inspired Music, Sound, Art and Design
excerpt: Abstract We investigated the ability of a Deep Belief Network with logistic nodes, trained unsupervised by Contrastive Divergence, to discover features of evolved abstract art images. Two Restricted Boltzmann Machine models were trained independently on low  ...
